alert.note: Alert for Bristol; Eastern Kent; Northwest Providence; Southeast Providence; Western Kent (Rhode Island) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued January 08 at 3:12PM EST until January 10 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Southeast winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph possible. * WHERE...Portions of eastern, northeastern and southeastern Massachusetts and northern Rhode Island. * WHEN...From Tuesday afternoon through Wednesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest winds will occur late Tuesday evening through daybreak Wednesday.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Bristol; Eastern Kent; Northwest Providence; Southeast Providence; Western Kent
